# This File contains a List of useful Extensions for Visual Studio Code

1.  [Python](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python)
1.  [Pylance](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.vscode-pylance)
1.  [IntelliCode](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=VisualStudioExptTeam.vscodeintellicode)
1.  [Live Share](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=MS-vsliveshare.vsliveshare)
1.  [GitHub Pull Requests and Issues](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=GitHub.vscode-pull-request-github)
1.  [GitLens](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=eamodio.gitlens)
1.  [Docker](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-docker)
1.  [Remote Containers](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode-remote.remote-containers)
1.  [Night Owl Theme](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=sdras.night-owl)
1.  [File Icons](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscode-icons-team.vscode-icons)
1.  [Bookmarks](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=alefragnani.Bookmarks)
1.  [Bracket Pair Colorizer](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=CoenraadS.bracket-pair-colorizer-2)
1.  [Todo Tree](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Gruntfuggly.todo-tree)
1.  [Code Spell Checker](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker)
1.  [Path Intellisense](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=christian-kohler.path-intellisense)
1.  [Microsoft SQL Server](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-mssql.mssql)
1.  [SQL Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=mtxr.sqltools)
1.  [SAP HANA Driver for SQL Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=SAPOSS.sap-hana-driver-for-sqltools)
1.  [Azure Account](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode.azure-account)
1.  [Azure App Service](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azureappservice)
1.  [Azure CLI Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode.azurecli)
1.  [Azure Machine Learning](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-toolsai.vscode-ai)
1.  [Azure Storage](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-azurestorage)
1.  [Remote SSH](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-vscode-remote.remote-ssh)
1.  [Kubernetes](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-kubernetes-tools.vscode-kubernetes-tools)
1.  [Rainbow CSV](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=mechatroner.rainbow-csv)
1.  [PDF Viewer](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=tomoki1207.pdf)
1.  [XML Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DotJoshJohnson.xml)
1.  [YAML](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=redhat.vscode-yaml)
1.  [SQLite](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=alexcvzz.vscode-sqlite)
1.  [Debugger for Chrome](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=msjsdiag.debugger-for-chrome)
1.  [Debugger for Firefox](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=firefox-devtools.vscode-firefox-debug)
1.  [SAP Fiori Tools](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=SAPSE.sap-ux-fiori-tools-extension-pack)
1.  [More Extensions can be found here ...](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/vscode)

## Further Information
If you plan on using the DevContainer als Development Environment, many of those Extensions are already installed.
For Details check 'devcontainer.json --> extensions'.
